channel.title: Comments on: Irish companies for InnovateEurope

item.title: By: Evert Bopp
item.dc:creator: Evert Bopp
item.description: Just had a look at this and really like the setup. Will be signing up I think. One thing I like very much is that there are no costs involved. Too many of these type of programs require an upfront payment. As cash is king for any startup, low-cost or free advice and mentoring is invaluable!
item.content:encoded:
Just had a look at this and really like the setup.
Will be signing up I think.
One thing I like very much is that there are no costs involved. Too many of these type of programs require an upfront payment. As cash is king for any startup, low-cost or free advice and mentoring is invaluable!

item.title: By: jose del moral
item.dc:creator: jose del moral
item.description: We have InnovateEurope Spain next week in Zaragoza. Will be there!!
item.content:encoded: We have InnovateEurope Spain next week in Zaragoza. Will be there!!
